Architects In

Speak To Our Project Manager





    HomeArchs - Best Architects In Varanasi

    At HomeArchs we provide you “Best-In-Class”  Architects service with our in-house experienced team of Construction Managers, Civil Engineers and Architects.  We give paramount importance to Quality and On-time Delivery of projects and we have streamlined our entire Project Management process which Guarantees you 251* Days Delivery of your entirely new Dream Home. 
    We have prepared a checklist to perform more than 100+ Quality Checks of various materials and products which we use at different construction stages which made us deliver the best Quality possible. A home is as good as its plan. Our in-house team ensures your dream home to be designed aesthetically keeping all Vastu Compliances, Concept Designing, 3D Models so as to ensure best utilisation of area and giving a naturally lit home with good ventilation. It also helps you get the exact look and feel of the final product which is going to be delivered.

    Home Construction

    When building a home we give adequate time to its planning as this can save your lot of time and efforts involve in the Architects journey at best Home Construction Cost in Varanasi.

    The team at HomeArchs has simplified your entire home construction process like a cake walk wherein we will be eliminating all of your hustles in looking out for a good construction contractor, finding best architects, electricians, plumber, and sourcing multiple construction materials available throughout the home construction process.

    We have created a completely transparent and trackable mechanism through which you can have an update on your projects on a biweekly basis and track the progress. Our journey does not just ends on the handover of the projects but we will be there after it also the home delivered by HomeArchs comes with up to 10 years of warranty.

    HomeArchs - Best Architects In  Varanasi: We have created multiple pricing plans suiting every type of need which starts from Just INR 799* per sq.ft. onwards.

     

    Know More Or How It Works

    Architectural Services Packages In Varanasi

    PLOT AREA UPTO
    1500 SQ.FT.

    INR 21,000/-

    1. Floor Plan- 2D

    (5 Changes)

    2.Furniture Layout- 2D
    3. Structural Drawings
    1. 1. Column Center Layout

    2. Foundation Detail
    3. Column Details
    4. Plinth Beam & Slab Beam Details

    4. Working Drawing
    5. Door Window Schedule
    6. Electrical Drawings
    7. Plumbing & Drainage Layouts
    8. 3D External Elevation
    1. (2 Changes)
    9. Vastu Compliant Designs

    PLOT AREA BETWEEN
    1500-2200 SQ.FT.

    INR 31,000/-

    1. Floor Plan- 2D

    (5 Changes)

    2.Furniture Layout- 3D
    3. Structural Drawings
    1. 1. Column Center Layout

    2. Foundation Detail
    3. Column Details
    4. Plinth Beam & Slab Beam Details

    4. Working Drawing
    5. Door Window Schedule
    6. Electrical Drawings
    7. Plumbing & Drainage Layouts
    8. 3D External Elevation
    1. (2 Changes)
    9. Vastu Compliant Designs

    PLOT AREA BETWEEN
    2200-3500 SQ.FT.

    INR 37,500/-

    1. Floor Plan- 2D

    (5 Changes)

    2.Furniture Layout- 3D
    3. Structural Drawings
    1. 1. Column Center Layout

    2. Foundation Detail
    3. Column Details
    4. Plinth Beam & Slab Beam Details

    4. Working Drawing
    5. Door Window Schedule
    6. Electrical Drawings
    7. Plumbing & Drainage Layouts
    8. 3D External Elevation
    1. (2 Changes)
    9. Vastu Compliant Designs

    NOTE:- Prices are Valid for upto G+2 floors only. INR 5000/- per floor will be charged extra for each additional floors afterwards.

    Home Construction Cost In Varanasi

    The Most Affordable Construction Cost in Varanasi

     

    BUDGET PACKAGE

    INR 1699/- PER SQ.FT

    1. Drawings & Layouts
    1. 1. Floor Plan

      2. Furniture Layout

      3. 3D Exterior Elevation
    2. Foundation Work
    1. 1. Excavation- Upto 5 feet below Ground Level

    2. PCC- As per Requirement

    3. Foundation - As per Structural Drawing

    4. Plinth Beam- As Per Drawing

    3. Structural Details

    `1. Aggregates-10mm,20mm,40mm (As required)

    2. Cement- Prism/Birla

    3. Steel- Gallant

    4. RCC- M-20 (1:1.5:3)

    5. Brick Work- First class
    6. 9” Outer Walls ( 1:5)
    7. 5" Inner Walls (1:5)

    8. Plaster - (1:4) 1 Coat

    9. Ceiling Height- 10 feet clear height

    4. Bathrooms
    1. 1. Wall Tiles- 7 feet height ceramic tiles upto Rs. 40 per sq.ft.
    2. 2. Floor Tiles- Vitrified tiles upto Rs. 40 Per sq.ft.

    3. Sanitary Fittings- EWC upto Rs. 4000/- ( Cera/Parryware)

    4. CP Fittings- Wall Mixer, Shower, Towel Rail, Soap Dish, Health Faucet
    Upto Rs. 10,000/- (Cera)

    5.Kitchen
    1. 1. Wall Tiles- Upto 2 feet above kitchen slab (upto Rs. 40 per sq.ft.)

    2. Floor Tiles- Vitrified (upto Rs. 40 per sq.ft.)

    3. Kitchen Slab- Granite Upto INR 150 per sq.ft.

    4. Sink- Stainless Steel Incluiding faucet Upto Rs. 3000

    6. Doors & Windows
    1. 1. Frame/Chaukhat- Iron Pipe

    2. Main Door- Flush door with Laminates
    3. (7' * 3') Upto INR 9,000/- incluiding fittings

    4. Internal Doors- Flush Doors (7' * 3') with Laminates (Upto INR 5,500/- including fittings)

    5. Windows- UPVC Window 2 Track with 5mm Glass Shutter Upto INR 350 per sq.ft

    6. Window Grill- Basic MS Pipe @ 1.2kg per sq.ft.

    7. Painting
    1. 1. Internal- 2 Coat Putty + 1 Coat Primer + 2 Coat Paint
      ( JK Putty, Berger Rangoli )

    2. External – Berger/Nerolac

    8. Flooring
    1. 1. Living Room & BedRooms- 2'*2' Vitrified Tiles Upto Rs. 40 per sq.ft
    9. Plumbing
    1. 1. Internal Plumbing- CPVC Pipe and CPVC Fittings (Prince)

    Sewer lines- Internal, External and Vertical all CPVC pipes and fittings (Prince)

    2. Water Supply- From Boring/Pump to overhead tank in CPVC pipes and fittings

    3. Overhead Tanks- 500L (Prince) Double Layered

    10. Electrical
    1. 1. Copper Wires- KEI or Kent

    2. Switches & Sockets- Anchor Penta

    11. Miscellaneous
    1. 1. Staircase Grill- MS Pipe Railing with Paint

    STANDARD PACKAGE

    INR 1899/- PER SQ.FT.

    1. Drawings & Layouts
    1. 1. Floor Plan

      2. Furniture Layout

      3. 3D Exterior Elevation

    2. 4.Structural Drawing ( Footing, Beams, Columns, Slabs)
    3. 5.Working Drawings
    2. Foundation Work
    1. 1. Excavation- Upto 5 feet below Ground Level

    2. PCC- As per Structural

    3. Foundation - As per Structural Drawing

    4. Drawings Foundation - As per Structural Drawings Plinth Beam- As Per Drawing
    (All Designs at par with IS 456:2000)

    3. Structural Details
    1. 1. Aggregates-10mm,20mm,40mm (As required)

    2. Cement- Ultratech
    Steel- Kamdhenu NXT

    3. CC- M-20 (1:1.5:3)

    4. Brick Work- First class
    5. 9” Outer Walls ( 1:5)
    6. 5" Inner Walls (1:4)

    7. Plaster - (1:4) 1 Coat

    8. Ceiling Height- 10.5 feet clear height

    4. Bathrooms
    1. 1. Wall Tiles- Upto 7 feet height ceramic tiles upto Rs. 50 per sq.ft.

    2. 2.Floor Tiles- Vitrified Double Charged tiles upto Rs. 55 Per sq.ft.
      (Kajaria/Jhonson)

    3. Sanitary Fittings- EWC upto Rs. 8000/- + Wash Basin upto Rs. 2000/-
    (Hindware)

    4. CP Fittings- Pillar Cock, Wall Mixer, Shower, Towel Rail, Soap Dish, Health Faucet Upto Rs. 15,000/-
    (Hindware/Jaquar)
    Water Proofing- Using Dr. Fixit

    5.Kitchen
    1. 1. Wall Tiles- Upto 2 feet above kitchen slab (Upto Rs. 50 per sq.ft.)

    2. Floor Tiles- Vitrified Double Charged (Upto Rs. 55 per sq.ft.)
    (Kajaria/Jhonson)

    3. Kitchen Slab- Granite Upto INR 170 per sq.ft.

    4. Sink- Stainless Steel with faucet (Jaquar/Hindware/Parryware) Upto Rs.
    4500

     

     

     

     

    6. Doors & Windows
    1. 1. Frame/Chaukhat- Iron Pipe (For Main Door- 5" by 3" & Internal doors 4" by 2.5")

    2. Main Door- Teak (Sagwan Door Upto Rs.
    15,000/-) (7' * 3'3”) Incluiding all fittings

    3. Internal Doors- Flush Doors
    (7' * 3') with Laminates Upto INR 7000/- incluiding fittings

    4. Windows- UPVC/Plywood Shutter Window with 5mm Glass Shutter Upto INR 450 per sq.ft

    5. Window Grill- Basic MS Grill @ 1.6kg per sq.ft.

    7. Painting
    1. 1. Internal- 2 Coat Putty + 1 Coat Primer + 2 Coat Paint
      ( JK Putty & Asian Tractor Shyne Emulsion)

    2. External - Asian Ace Exterior Emulsion

    8. Flooring
    1. 1. Living Room & BedRooms- 2'*2' Vitrified Tiles Upto Rs. 55 per sq.ft. (Kajaria/Jhonson)

    2. Staircase- Marble/Granite upto Rs. 80 per sq.ft

    3. Parking Tiles- Anti Skid upto Rs. 35 per sq.ft.

    9. Plumbing
    1. 1. Internal Plumbing- CPVC Pipe and CPVC Fittings (Ashirvad)

    2. Sewer lines- Internal, External and Vertical all CPVC pipes and fittings (Ashirvad)

    3. Water Supply- From Boring/Pump to overhead tank in CPVC pipes and fittings

    Overhead Tanks- 1000L (Prince) Double or Triple Layered

    10. Electrical
    1. 1. Copper Wires- Polycab

    2. Switches & Sockets- Modular switches (Anchor Rider)

    11. Miscellaneous
    1. 1. Staircase Grill- MS Railing with Enamel Paint

    2. Balcony- MS Steel with Enamel Paint

    CLASSIC PACKAGE

    INR 2099/- PER SQ.FT.

    1. Drawings & Layouts
    1. 1. Floor Plan

    2. 3D Furniture Layout

    3. 3D Building Elevation

    4. Structural Drawing ( Footing, Beams, Columns, Slabs)

    5. Working Drawings Plumbing & Drainage Drawings
    6.Electrical Drawings

    2. Foundation Work
    1. 1. Excavation- Upto 5 feet below Ground
      2. Level PCC- As per Structural Drawings
      3. Foundation - As per Structural Drawings
      4. Plinth Beam- As Per Drawing
      (All Designs at par with IS 456:2000)
    3. Structural Details
    1. 1. Aggregates-10mm,20mm,40mm (As required)

    2. Cement- ACC Suraksha

    3. Steel- Tata Steel

    4. RCC- M-20 (1:1.5:3)

    5. Brick Work- First class
    6. 9” Outer Walls ( 1:5)
    7. 5" Inner Walls (1:4)

    8. Plaster - (1:4) 1 Coat

    Ceiling Height- 11 feet clear height

    4. Bathrooms
    1. 1. Wall Tiles- Upto 7 feet height ceramic tiles (upto Rs.
      65 per sq.ft.) (Kajaria/Jhonson)

    2. Floor Tiles- Vitrified (Double Charged/ Glossy/Matt/ Full Body tiles) (upto Rs. 70 per sq.ft.)
    (Kajaria/Jhonson)

    3. Sanitary Fittings- EWC Upto Rs. 12,000/- + Wash Basin upto Rs. 3000/-
    (Hindware )

    4. CP Fittings- Pillar Cock, Wall Mixer, Direct Water Bib Cock, Shower, Hand Shower, Towel Rail, Soap Dish, Health Faucet
    Upto Rs. 20,000/-
    (Jaquar)

    Water Proofing- Using Dr. Fixit

    5.Kitchen
    1. 1. Wall Tiles- Upto 2 feet above kitchen slab (Upto Rs. 65 per sq.ft.) (Kajaria/Jhonson)

    2. Floor Tiles- Vitrified (Double Charged/ Glossy/Matt/ Full Body tiles)
    (upto Rs. 70 per sq.ft.)
    (Kajaria/Jhonson)

    3. Kitchen Slab- Granite Upto INR 200 per sq.ft.

    4. Sink- Stainless Steel Double Bowl (Carysil) with faucet ( Jaquar/) Upto Rs. 8000/-

    Water Proofing- Dr. Fixit

    6. Doors & Windows
    1. 1. Frame/Chaukhat- Malaysian Sakhu frame (For Main Door- 5" by 3" & internal doors 4" by 2.5")

    2. Main Door- Teak (Sagwan Door Upto Rs. 20,000) (7' by 3.3’') Incluiding all fittings

    3. Internal Doors- Flush Doors (7' * 3') with Laminates Upto INR 9000/- incluiding fittings

    4. Windows- UPVC Slider 3 track Windows Upto INR 550 per sq.ft.

    5. Window Grill- Basic MS Grill @ 2kg per sq.ft.

    7. Painting
    1. 1. Internal- 2 Coat Putty + 1 Coat Primer + 2 Coat Paint
      ( JK Putty & Asian Royal Emulsion )

    2. External - Asian Apex Ultima

    8. Flooring
    1. 1. Living Room & BedRooms- 2' by 2' or 4’ by 2’ Vitrified Tiles (Double Charged/ Glossy/Matt/ Full Body tiles) Upto Rs. 70 per sq.ft. (Kajaria/Jhonson)

    2. Staircase- Marble/Granite upto Rs. 90 per sq.ft

    3. Parking Tiles- Anti Skid upto Rs. 40 per sq.ft

    9. Plumbing
    1. 1. Internal Plumbing- CPVC Pipe and CPVC Fittings (Supreme)

    2. Sewer lines- Internal, External and Vertical all CPVC pipes and fittings (Supreme)

    3. Water Supply- From Boring/Pump to overhead tank in CPVC pipes and fittings

    4. Overhead Tanks- Upto 2000L Ashirvad Double or Triple Layered

    10. Electrical
    1. 1. Copper Wires-Havells

    2. Switches & Sockets- Modular Switches
    (Anchor Roma)

    11. Miscellaneous
    1. 1.Staircase Grill- MS Steel Designer Railing

      2. Balcony- MS Steel Designer Railing

    Why Choose Us HomeArchs?

    Dedicated in House Team

    100% Transparency

    Guaranteed 251 Days Delivery

    100+ Quality Checks

    Upto 10 Years Warranty

    100% Customer Satisfaction

    You cannot do the planning of a house without the help of an architect. Just as you need an engineer to evaluate the construction aspect, an architect is responsible for its design

    Tips to Hire the Best Architect for Your Dream House Construction

    The architect will be responsible for understanding your needs and corresponding with the building design. The objective of a reputed architect will be to ensure that your house is built

    Need a Free Consultation?

    Want to know more about it, please feel free to speak to our Project Mangers.
